pull.title: gui: Fix leak in CoinControlDialog::updateView
pull.body: Taken from #17457, the first commit is a similar to 88a94f7bb8ba2b0257315d70717f9af928ca6561 but for test binary, and the second commit fixes a leak where `CCoinControlWidgetItem` are unnecessarily created and leaked.

rename.from: gui: Fix itemWalletAddress leak when not tree mode

events.body: @promag How could I observe the Qt warning that is fixed by f95ebe7c215fd8cb00f6ff69722506227f7afa6e?

a3a02ddea936109cc43338429d4f20efe4cdee99:

This constructor https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/a3a02ddea936109cc43338429d4f20efe4cdee99/src/qt/coincontroldialog.h#L34 is unused now and could be removed.

> @promag How could I observe the Qt warning that is fixed by [f95ebe7](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/f95ebe7c215fd8cb00f6ff69722506227f7afa6e)?

I've seen the warning while working on #17457.

> is unused now and could be removed.

Thanks, removed.

> > @promag How could I observe the Qt warning that is fixed by [f95ebe7](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/f95ebe7c215fd8cb00f6ff69722506227f7afa6e)?
> 
> I've seen the warning while working on #17457.

Mind providing steps to reproduce? I've already tried to run `test_bitcoin-qt` with `QT_QPA_PLATFORM=xcb` and with unset `QT_QPA_PLATFORM`, and did not spot "Cannot queue arguments of type size_t" warning.
I'm so curious because it could be the first `qRegisterMetaType` in the `qt/test/test_main.cpp`.

Another suggestion: if this commit is related to #17457, maybe move it to #17457?

The first commit looks indeed after a memory leak fix.
How relevant is the second commit f95ebe7c215fd8cb00f6ff69722506227f7afa6e?

events.message: gui: Fix itemWalletAddress leak when not tree mode

events.body: ACK e8123eae40eb264bbb71007d0eb074901f0e2fe5, tested on Linux Mint 19.3.

issue.title: [0.20] Final backports for rc2
issue.body:
Backports the following PRs to the 0.20 branch:

* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18578: gui: Fix leak in CoinControlDialog::updateView
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18808: [net processing] Drop unknown types in getdata
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18814: rpc: Relock wallet only if most recent callback
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18878: test: Add test for conflicted wallet tx notifications
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18894: gui: Fix manual coin control with multiple wallets loaded
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18742: miner: Avoid stack-use-after-return in validationinterface
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18962: net processing: Only send a getheaders for one block in an INV
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18975: test: Remove const to work around compiler error on xenial
